articles.author: Robin Schmidt
articles.description:
Three projects announced zkEVM updates, Polygon, Scroll and zkSYNC last week. L2 rollups designed to ease the burden on Ethereum using zkProofs. The EVM stands for Ethereum Virtual Machine. In this case representing equivalence or compatibility although the two are not the same thing. Yes, it’s L2 Summer! 2022 is the year of L2 summer! …
  zxEVM- Who’s Announced What and WTF is it? Read More »
articles.title: zxEVM- Who’s Announced What and WTF is it?
